author: Unity
description:
Welcome to Fort Oasis, a decaying nightmare where reality crumbles around you. From the creator of Turbo Overkill, "Total Chaos" thrusts you into a survival-horror experience stacked with mysteries and monstrosities. As you navigate this treacherous landscape, scavenge for resources to craft weapons and defend yourself against the unknown.

Guided only by a mysterious voice on your walkie-talkie, you must delve into the island's depths to uncover its darkest secrets. Will you survive the chaos, or become part of it?

Developed by: Trigger Happy Interactive
Published by: Apogee Entertainment

Learn more: https://on.unity.com/TotalChaos
Discover more Unity-powered games: https://on.unity.com/madewith



#MadeWithUnity #UnityGames #Unity #TotalChaos #SurvivalHorror
title: Total Chaos Launch Trailer Spotlight
